speech: I didn't quite catch what you said. What would you like to do at Ninja Cafe?
Sorry, what did you say? Let me know if you want to order something, check on your current orders, or enquire about the items on sale!
Hmm, I don't understand. What would you like to do at Ninja Cafe?
Welcome to Ninja Cafe! I didn't quite get what you said, but let me know if I can be of any assistance.
I'm sorry, what? Let me know how I can help you!
